title: I am a Stockholm-based multidisciplinary designer.
text: I design and build purpose driven experiences based on qualitative research data, with a devotion to process and transparency. I'm passionate about the journey from an idea, to its creation all the way to its implementation.

Currently working at Grace, a fintech company distrupting the consumer credit market and helping people improve their financial health. This environment allows me to pursue another passion - sharing the knowledge I have gained over the years with as many people as possible.
